text: C-3PO is a fictional character in the Star Wars series. He is a translator droid/robot that speaks over 6 million languages. He has a humanoid form and is present in every movie of the saga with the exception of Solo. His companion is R2-D2. Anthony Daniels plays C-3PO and is the only person to appear in all 11 Star Wars films. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1977 Category:Star Wars characters Category:Star Wars Anthology characters Category:Star Wars Skywalker Saga characters
title: C-3PO
